definition: to clarify/to fully understand
lane/alley
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: At (long) last we found out what had really happened.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我們終於弄清了實際發生的情況。

sentences.english: Well, let's suppose we've done it.
And when it was made plain who Kino was, the doctor grew stern and judicious at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 弄清楚誰是吉納後，醫生變得嚴肅認真而又明智起來。

sentences.english: He did it by way of discovering the truth.
sentences.chinese: 他這樣做是爲了弄清事實。

sentences.english: We need to know why honeybees are dying.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要弄清楚蜜蜂正在消亡的原因。

sentences.english: Sometimes a mediated conversation will straighten things out, and a little discussion and apology can calm the waters.
sentences.chinese: 有時調解可以弄清真相，討論和道歉能平息風波。

sentences.english: We must make certain of facts.
We'll get the case straightened out.
Was she always like this or was it some way of “getting at” Nicolas?
sentences.chinese: 弄清楚她是一貫如此還是因爲尼古拉斯引起的？

sentences.english: After careful investigation，he got to know the ins and outs of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 經過仔細的調查，他終於弄清了事件的前因後果。

sentences.english: You'd better send somebody over there to sort the situation out.
sentences.chinese: 你最好派個人到那兒去把情況弄清。

sentences.english: You also need to figure out if you yourself are a disrupter.
sentences.chinese: 你還應該弄清楚自己是否也是“破壞者”。

sentences.english: Once you’ve calmed down, try to see what really happened.
sentences.chinese: 一旦冷靜下來，你應該弄清楚到底是怎麼回事。

sentences.english: Find out how much your surveyor's and solicitor's fees will be.
sentences.chinese: 弄清你要向鑑定員和律師支付多少費用。

sentences.english: To answer this question we must first understand the concept of decolonization .
sentences.chinese: 回答這個問題前首先要弄清殖民這個概念。

sentences.english: All changes must be cleared in advance through the AC or HD and ORL.
sentences.chinese: 所有的變化一定要弄清楚交流或提前以HD和ORL。

definition: to figure out how to do something
to find out/to ascertain/to get to the bottom of/to clarify
to distinguish (between different things)/to make distinctions clear
to clarify (the facts)/clarification
clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about
to make sense of/to grasp the meaning of/to figure out
to suss out/to figure out/to ascertain
the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
to see clearly
to see clearly/to recognize/to realize
to explain
to clarify/to distinguish/to elucidate
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
to find/to search out
to know/to understand
to investigate and find out/to ascertain
